com.epam.finaltask.service

Class RegistrationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.finaltask.service.AbstractService
      • com.epam.finaltask.service.RegistrationService

  • public class RegistrationService
extends AbstractService
    Service class that provides registration logic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegistrationService

        public RegistrationService(DaoFactory daoFactory,
                           ConnectionManagerFactory connectionManagerFactory,
                           HashGeneratorFactory hashGeneratorFactory)
        Creates RegistrationService with chosen DaoFactory, connectionManagerFactory, hashGeneratorFactory.
        Parameters:
        daoFactory - Factory that is used to create DAO objects
        connectionManagerFactory - Factory that is used to create AbstractConnectionManager subclass instances
        hashGeneratorFactory - Factory that is used to create HashGenerator implementations

      • RegistrationService

        public RegistrationService()
        Creates RegistrationService with DaoFactory and ConnectionManagerFactory defined in AbstractService no-argument constructor and HashGeneratorFactoryImpl as HashGeneratorFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • registerAccount

        public RegistrationService.RegistrationResult registerAccount(java.lang.String username,
                                                              java.lang.String password,
                                                              java.lang.String email)
                                                       throws ServiceException
        Register account, storing it's data in the database. If account with chosen email or username already exists, returns RegistrationService.RegistrationResult.EMAIL_EXISTS or RegistrationService.RegistrationResult.USERNAME_EXISTS respectively.
        Parameters:
        username - Accounts username
        password - Accounts password
        email - Accounts email. Registration of the account with email that is already used by another account is not permitted
        Returns:
        RegistrationService.RegistrationResult constant based on the registration result.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If PersistenceException thrown
